Paulina Oduro bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọka ikpe na onye na-eme ihe omume nkwago.
Ọ dị 7ft  8 n'ịdị elu nwanyị kachasị ogologo na Ghana
A mụrụ Paulina Oduro na Sekondi-Takoradi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ghana

Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ kwagara Japan nọọ afọ abụọ ya na nna ya, onye nnọchi anya, na nne ya, ma mụọ ịkpọ piano oge ochie ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu. Ya na nne na nna ya mere njem gaa London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ma sonye n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ, dị ka ime ihe nkiri na ịgba egwu. Ọ ghọrọ onye nọọsụ gutara ọnụ ya mgbe afọ iri gachara, mana mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ a iji gbasoo nka ma malite ịbụ abụ ọkachamara.
Ọrụ ịbụ abụ Oduro gawara azụmahịa n'afọ 1980 mgbe ndị egwu na ndị otu ya na-akụ egwu, gụnyere David Rudder na Arrow, webatara ya na egwu soca na reggae
O so na otu nke Casanova reggae band n'afọ 1982 nke wepụtara otu egwu "Loving You This Way" n'ime ọnwa isii. Oduro gara naanị ya n'afọ 1999, ma mehee abọm ya bụ Woman Power

A kọrọ na Oduro kwagara biri na Ghana n'afọ 2009 n'ihi nwa ya nwoke Raymond Charles's Jnr na-eme ka ihere mee ezinụlọ ya site n'iji ọhịa mgbanaka.
Nwa nwa ya bụ Carter bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ ama ama na Wales, United Kingdom.
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ nne Teresa nke Ghana
N'ezie, a ka na  ebo ebubo nkea
Oduro emela  ọtụtụ nkwado ego na ihe omume ebere site na mmemme ya
Ihe omume ndị a gụnyere Love Your World 5000 for Autism awareness, Dream Child African Renaissance Project na Grand Ball nke MUSIGA.
Oduro jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya mgbasa ozi Ama K
Abebrese malitere na July 2014 na-akwalite ọdịdị ụcha akpụkpọ anụ ahụ

Ọ na-esonyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ a ma ama na Ghana, gụnyere Hamamat Montia na Nana Ama McBrown, dị ka ndị na-ebute N'okwụ megide ntepu ụgha akpụkpọ ahụ na mgbasa ozi nke "I love My Natural Skin Tone".
